title: Flag of Iceland
cardDescription: The flag of Iceland is described as 'national flag of Icelanders is blue as the sky with a snow-white cross, and a fiery-red cross inside the white cross.'
description: The flag of Iceland is described as 'national flag of Icelanders is blue as the sky with a snow-white cross, and a fiery-red cross inside the white cross. The arms of the cross extend to the edge of the flag, and their combined width is 2/9, but the red cross 1/9 of the combined width of the flag. The dimensions between the width and length are 18:25.'

content: Proportion:
Finished size:
Hook size:
14cm x 10cm
3,5 mm
Yarn:
Blue (as A)
Red (as B)
White (as C)
/crochet-pattern-images/european-flags/flag-of-iceland.png

content.content: This pattern is worked horizontally starting from the middle and doing top and bottom parts separately. Also note that the starting chain is counted as row 1.

content: With B, ch 27
Sc 2nd ch from hook, sc 24, sbc, turn
Ch 1, sc 7, scb, sc 1, sbc, sc 15, sca, turn
Ch 1, sc 14, sac, scb, sc 1, sbc, sca, sc 7, turn
Ch 1, sc 6, sac, scb, sc 1, sbc, sca, sc 15, turn
Ch 1, sc 14, sac, scb, sc 1, sbc, sca, sc 7, turn
Ch 1, sc 6, sac, scb, sc 1, sbc, sca, sc 15, turn
Ch 1, sc 14, sac, scb, sc 1, sbc, sca, sc 7, turn
Ch 1, sc 6, sac, scb, sc 1, sbc, sca, sc 15, turn
Ch 1, sc 14, sac, scb, sc 1, sbc, sca, sc 7, fasten off
attach C to first ch of row 1, ch 1, sc 7, scb, sc 1, sbc, sc 15, sca, turn
Ch 1, sc 14, sac, scb, sc 1, sbc, sca, sc 7, turn
Ch 1, sc 6, sac, scb, sc 1, sbc, sca, sc 15, turn
Ch 1, sc 14, sac, scb, sc 1, sbc, sca, sc 7, turn
Ch 1, sc 6, sac, scb, sc 1, sbc, sca, sc 15, turn
Ch 1, sc 14, sac, scb, sc 1, sbc, sca, sc 7, turn
Ch 1, sc 6, sac, scb, sc 1, sbc, sca, sc 15, turn
Ch 1, sc 14, sac, scb, sc 1, sbc, sca, sc 7, turn
